alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 10 at 10:03AM PST until November 11 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 29 to 35 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio and Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
